title: You're Still The One
description: One love. One man. Two chances. Ashley has her life sorted out. After a painful divorce, she has now rebuilt her life as an editor. She is happy with her life—until her ex-husband Andrew walks into it, opening up the deep scars that even time has failed to heal. He’s gorgeous, funny and as utterly tempting as he was seven years ago. Plus, being the editor for his new book, she cannot avoid him. But Andrew has his own issues lingering from the past. Bound together by work, every breath they take draws them closer, into the same hopeless, passionate love that they once shared...
author: Sasha Clinton
